Welcome to My ML Journey

2025-08-17• 1 min read

Hello

hehe

hoho

hichic

aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa

Thanks for stopping by. This space will track my learning path from undergraduate foundations toward (hopefully) a future PhD in machine learning. Expect:

  • Concept explainers (building intuition)
  • Paper distillations & reproduction attempts
  • Weekly research / learning logs
  • Experiment retrospectives (what failed & why)
  • Personal reflections & milestones

If you're on a similar path, I hope the transparency (including the dead ends) helps. hehe
